title: Implement Bubble Sort
description: Write a function to implement the bubble sort algorithm.

title: Implement Depth-First Search
description: Write a function to implement the depth-first search algorithm for graph traversal.

title: Implement Binary Search Tree
description: Write a class to implement a binary search tree data structure with basic operations.

title: Solve Knapsack Problem
description: Write a function to solve the 0/1 knapsack problem using dynamic programming.

title: Implement Breadth-First Search
description: Write a function to implement the breadth-first search algorithm for graph traversal.
